Description.Text: A spacious, quiet, light and bright hotel, with a garden and fabulous views across the city. The hotel stands in a typical building remodel-led in 2003, the former Seminario Mayor [conference hall], located 300m from the Cathedral, on the Camino de Santiago and within easy reach of the Parque del Castillo. The rooms at the 4-star Abba Bur gos are comfortable and have lots of natural light. Rooms are all air conditioned, with a work desk and hairdryer. Executive rooms open onto a balcony, terrace or private garden subject to availability. Free access to Fitness Center, heated pool, sauna, gym and paddle court In the Abba Bur gos hotel are offering you the possibility to travel with your pet. No more inconveniences. Travel-ling with your pet will be easier now with Abba hotels. For 21 euros (taxes included) in addition to the room price. Please indicate in you reservation if you are travel-ling with your pet. Amenities - Dry cleaning, Reception.
Abba Bur gos is located in the city-center, at only 300 meters from the Cathedral and Plaza Mayor lies within 400 meters.

Standard Room - Standard Room offers 1 Double or 2 Single beds with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, mini bar, safe in room and telephone. All rooms have a fully-equipped bathroom with hairdryer and magnifying mirror, as well as "Atapuerca collection" courtesy items exclusive to abba Hoteles, direct dial telephone, over 30 digital TV channels, satellite TV, Canal Atapuerca (exclusive to the Hotel abba Burgos), free-of-charge trouser press, modem socket with broadband and WiFi Internet connection. Rooms include free use of heated swimming pool, sauna, gym, outdoor solarium and paddle tennis court.
Executive Room - Executive Room offers 1 Double or 2 Single beds with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, mini bar, safe in room and telephone. All rooms have a fully-equipped bathroom with hairdryer and magnifying mirror, as well as "Atapuerca collection" courtesy items exclusive to Abba Hotel-es, direct dial telephone, over 30 digital TV channels, satellite TV, Canal Atapuerca (exclusive to the Hotel Abba Bur gos), free-of-charge trouser press, modem socket with broadband and WiFi Internet connection. Rooms include free use of heated swimming pool, sauna, gym, outdoor solarium and paddle tennis court. Executive rooms include VIP treatment with the following benefits: Preferential booking system Check-in from 10 a.m. Rooms available until 6 p.m. the day you leave.
Triple Room - Triple Room (2 Adults + 1 Child Up To 12 Years)offers 1 double and 1 twin bed or 3 twin beds with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, mini bar, safe in room and telephone. Children's welcome presents at check-in "Color in hotels" or "Color in Abby mascot". All rooms have a fully-equipped en suite bathroom with hairdryer and magnifying mirror, as well as "Atapuerca collection" courtesy items exclusive to Abba Hotel-es, direct dial telephone, over 30 digital TV channels, satellite TV, Canal Atapuerca (exclusive to the Hotel Abba Bur gos), free-of-charge trouser press, modem socket with broadband and WiFi Internet connection. Rooms include free use of heated swimming pool, sauna, gym, outdoor solarium and paddle tennis court.
Triple Room - Triple room (3 adults)offers 3 twin beds with air conditioning, bathroom amenities, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, mini bar, safe in room and telephone. Children's welcome presents at check-in "Color in hotels" or "Color in Abby mascot". All rooms have a fully-equipped en suite bathroom with hairdryer and magnifying mirror, as well as "Atapuerca collection" courtesy items exclusive to Abba Hotel-es, direct dial telephone, over 30 digital TV channels, satellite TV, Canal Atapuerca (exclusive to the Hotel Abba Bur gos), free-of-charge trouser press, modem socket with broadband and WiFi Internet connection. Rooms include free use of heated swimming pool, sauna, gym, outdoor solarium and paddle tennis court.
